PC Number: 2004-0160

Date: 2004-03-05

                     Whereas, by Order in Council P.C. 2001-1293 of July 31, 2001, Marc LeFrançois was appointed President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., effective September 1, 2001, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years;


                     Whereas on February 10, 2004, the November 2003 Report of the Auditor General was tabled in the House of Commons, and in Chapter 3 described certain transactions involving VIA Rail Canada Inc.;


                     Whereas at the relevant time Marc LeFrançois was the Chairman of the board of directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc., and was personally involved in these transactions;


                     Whereas, by Order in Council P.C. 2004-148 of February 24, 2004, Marc LeFrançois was suspended, without pay, from his duties as President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., until further notice;


                     Whereas, by letter dated February 24, 2004, the Minister of Transport invited Marc LeFrançois to show cause in writing, on or before 4:00 p.m. on March 1, 2004, why his appointment as President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc. should not be terminated;


                     Whereas Marc LeFrançois made submissions, both in writing and orally, in response to the invitation of the Minister of Transport;


                     And whereas the Governor in Council, having considered Chapter 3 of the November 2003 Report of the Auditor General, and in particular the transactions involving VIA Rail Canada Inc. described in that Report, and the submissions received from Marc LeFrançois,

 

(a) has lost confidence in Marc LeFrançois as President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., and

 

(b) is of the opinion that the role played by Marc LeFrançois in the transactions is incompatible with his continued appointment as President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc.;


.../2

- 2 -




                     Therefore, Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Transport, pursuant to subsection 105(5) of the Financial Administration Act, hereby terminates the appointment of Marc LeFrançois as President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., made by Order in Council P.C. 2001-1293 of July 31, 2001.
